author: plujan
body: This uses the 2018 data so far, extrapolated over the rest of the year. For more details see the slides here: https://indico.cern.ch/event/737811/contributions/3045257/attachments/1670000/2678601/pu_projections_2018_june.pdf
title: Pileup scenario for 2018 using an extrapolation of data to date.
